billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO CULTURAL AFFAIRS, TOURISM, PARKS AND RECREATION

title: Requires the office of parks, recreation and historic preservation to preserve and maintain state historic sites that are closed for more than a month
summary: Requires the office of parks, recreation and historic preservation to preserve and maintain state historic sites that are closed for more than a month.
currentCommittee: CULTURAL AFFAIRS, TOURISM, PARKS AND RECREATION
lawSection: Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation Law
actClause: AN ACT to amend the parks, recreation and historic preservation law, in relation to the maintenance and preservation of state historic sites
